text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Gaming device" means a paddle wheel, wheel of fortune, chance book, raffle, or any other mechanism for playing a game of chance.

text.section: "Multiple gaming device permit" means a permit that allows the use of two or more gaming devices.
"Raffle" means a lottery using paper chances in which prizes are won by persons who buy chances in the lottery.
